copyright_text.copyright: Copyright 2022 Jersey Group. All rights reserved.

data.title: Qatar Insulation
data.content: Qatar Insulation or QIC as we are more popularly known has hugely contributed to the insulation requirements of the region with its vast experience & efficient management of its customer requirements. Well trained sales team who are market aware & customer focused, catering to a wide range of applications. A well equipped & adequately stocked warehouse for swift emergency needs winning the customers’ goodwill creating strong bonds for continuing long term relationships.

data.title: Jersey Engineering
data.content: Jersey Engineering & Trading Company, a flagship company of  Jersey Group has more than two decades of experience in executing & delivering future-ready HVAC products and services. With offerings ranging from Centrifugal chillers to ventilation fans, valves, pumps &  large scale district cooling air conditioners; the company enjoys a virtual pole position in the market. Jersey Engineering & Trading Company is a single point solution provider for multiple customer requirements and is closely working with highly experienced consultants who are ever-ready to go the extra mile to ensure strong & lasting customer service.

data.title: Jersey Manufacturing
data.content: With the start up plant for Air Outlets & accessories ,we set foot into the manufacturing sector taking an early lead into this segment. JMC further grew in size & stature & has today set up two state of the art modern plants in the New Industrial Area ,Qatar producing high quality Fire & Smoke dampers that are UL listed & QCDD approved apart from the full range of diffusers, air outlets & Louvers.

data.title: Jersey Industrial
data.content: We are an established company in Qatar & one of the earliest subsidiaries of Jersey Group. Since our  inception as a trading house for engineering spares, Jersey Industrial Company or JIC has upgraded itself driven by zeal & passion into becoming one of the region’s leading engineering companies for Machinery Maintenance & Various retrofit solutions. Our wider scope includes Annual Maintenance Contracts, Automation Engineering, Control panel design & Assembly, Industrial Automation, Testing and Commissioning of Automation panels, MCC  Panels and services. JIC also has presence in Oil & Gas industries for supplying Insulations, Valves and Accessories for very specific applications.

data.title: Jersey Glass
data.content: At Jersey Glass , we are passionate about quality &  process some of the best glass variants produced by  the world’s  leading float glass manufacturers offering stunning finished products that dot a vast cross section of the prestigious tower projects in the region.

data.title: Firelink
data.content: Firelink, an end-to-end provider of building security solutions since 1996, leverages in-house expertise as well as technology and product know-how from world-renowned manufacturers to meet the fire & life safety needs of a wide range of clients from Commercial, Residential towers to Hotels, Oil & Gas sector, Hospitals and Large enterprises. We are a certified Qatar Civil Defence Grade A contractor. Firelink is also certified to widely recognized standards such as ISO 9001 (quality management systems), ISO 14001 (environmental management), and OSHAS 18001 (occupational health and safety). Furthermore, the organization is a member of National Fire Protection Association of USA (NFPA) and COFSA.

data.title: Jersey Services
data.content:
We provide Integrated Facility Management (IFM) services vide advanced technologies and Energy Efficiency Services that enhance optimized use of energy within your facilities. We also provide specialized services such as Fire and building safety & security systems.

Whether you are a corporate looking to focus on your core business or a property owner/owners association seeking to protect your investment, we are a single-source solution provider of the complete spectrum of facilities & services that can help you maximize your built assets while significantly lower operating costs and simplify overall maintenance management.

From day-to-day cleaning services to MEP maintenance and building system operations, security and emergency preparedness, we offer a total & comprehensive FM solution that match your needs. We can customize this solution further to suit specific client requirements and well-defined service level agreements that guarantee complete peace of mind for you.
